b'<!DOCTYPE html>\n<html lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">\n <head>\n  <meta charset="utf-8"/>\n  <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" name="viewport"/>\n  <title>\n   React-Waypoint\n  </title>\n  <meta content="React-Waypoint: Call a function when element\n  scrolls into view" name="description"/>\n  <meta content="Brigade Engineering Team" name="author"/>\n  <link href="styles/normalize.css" rel="stylesheet"/>\n  <link href="styles/bootstrap.css" rel="stylesheet"/>\n  <link href="styles/bootstrap-theme.css" rel="stylesheet"/>\n  <link href="styles/site.css" rel="stylesheet"/>\n  <link href="styles/examples/basic.css" rel="stylesheet"/>\n  <link href="styles/examples/infinite-scroll.css" rel="stylesheet"/>\n  <link href="styles/examples/examples.css" rel="stylesheet"/>\n  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/react/0.12.2/react-with-addons.min.js" type="text/javascript">\n  </script>\n  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/react/0.12.2/JSXTransformer.js" type="text/javascript">\n  </script>\n  <script src="src/waypoint.js">\n  </script>\n  <script>\n   var PropTypes = React.PropTypes;\n\nvar BasicExample = React.createClass({displayName: "BasicExample",\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  getInitialState: function() {\n    return {};\n  },\n\n  _setMessage: function(msg) {\n    this.setState({ message: msg });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderMessage: function() {\n    if (!this.state.message) {\n      return;\n    }\n\n    return (\n      React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__message"}, \n          this.state.message\n      )\n    );\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example"}, \n        this._renderMessage(), \n        React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__scrollable-parent"}, \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__waypoint-line"}), \n          React.createElement(Waypoint, {\n            onEnter: this._setMessage.bind(this, \'Waypoint entered\'), \n            onLeave: this._setMessage.bind(this, \'Waypoint left\')}\n          ), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"}), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "basic-example__spacer"})\n        )\n      )\n    );\n  }\n});\n  \n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,\n  </script>\n  <script>\n   /**\n * Randomly return either a cat or machine image url\n * @return {string}\n */\nvar currentIndex = 0;\nvar generateItem = function() {\n  var chooseCat = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2);\n  var ind = (currentIndex % 10) + 1;\n  var newImage = (chooseCat) ?\n    \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-\' + ind + \'.jpg\':\n    \'http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-\' + ind + \'.jpg\';\n  currentIndex++;\n  return newImage;\n}\n\nvar InfiniteScrollExample = React.createClass({displayName: "InfiniteScrollExample",\n  _loadMoreItems: function() {\n    var itemsToAdd = 3;\n    var secondsToWait = 2;\n    this.setState({ isLoading: true });\n    // fake an async. ajax call with setTimeout\n    window.setTimeout(function() {\n      // add data\n      var currentItems = this.state.items;\n      for (var i = 0; i &lt; itemsToAdd; i++) {\n        currentItems.push(generateItem());\n      }\n      this.setState({\n        items: currentItems,\n        isLoading: false,\n      });\n    }.bind(this), secondsToWait * 1000);\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  getInitialState: function() {\n    var initialItems = [\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-9.jpg\',\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-10.jpg\',\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-10.jpg\',\n    ];\n    return {\n      items: initialItems,\n      isLoading: false,\n    };\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderItems: function() {\n    return this.state.items.map(function(imageUrl, index) {\n      return (\n        React.createElement("img", {\n          src: imageUrl, \n          alt: "CATS AND ROBOTS... ", \n          style: { height: 480}, \n          key: index, \n          className: "infinite-scroll-example__list-item"})\n      );\n    });\n  },\n\n\n  _renderWaypoint: function() {\n    if (!this.state.isLoading) {\n      return (\n        React.createElement(Waypoint, {\n          onEnter: this._loadMoreItems}\n        )\n      );\n    }\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      React.createElement("div", {className: "infinite-scroll-example"}, \n        React.createElement("p", {className: "infinite-scroll-example__count"}, \n          "Items Loaded: ", this.state.items.length\n        ), \n        React.createElement("div", {className: "infinite-scroll-example__scrollable-parent"}, \n          this._renderItems(), \n          React.createElement("div", {className: "infinite-scroll-example__waypoint"}, \n            this._renderWaypoint(), \n            "Loading more items\xe2\x80\xa6"\n          )\n        ), \n        React.createElement("p", {className: "infinite-scroll-example__arrow"})\n      )\n    );\n  }\n});\n  \n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,\n  </script>\n  <script>\n   var PropTypes = React.PropTypes;\n\nvar BookmarkableHeader = React.createClass({displayName: "BookmarkableHeader",\n  propTypes: {\n    headerType: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    text: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    id: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderLink: function() {\n    return (\n      React.createElement("a", {\n        "aria-hidden": true, \n        href: \'#\' + this.props.id, className: "bookmarkable-header__symbol"\n      }, \n        "\xc2\xa7"\n      )\n    );\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderText: function() {\n    return (\n      React.createElement("span", {id: this.props.id, className: "bookmarkable-header__text"}, \n        this.props.text\n      )\n    );\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      React.createElement(\n        this.props.headerType,\n        { className: \'bookmarkable-header\' },\n        (this._renderLink()),\n        (this._renderText())\n      )\n    );\n  }\n});\n\nvar ExampleDemoAndCode = React.createClass({displayName: "ExampleDemoAndCode",\n  /**\n   * @param {String} words\n   * @return {String}\n   */\n  _convertToTitle: function(words) {\n    return words.replace(/-|_/g, \' \')\n    .replace(/\\b\\s?(\\S)/g, function(match, group) { return match.toUpperCase(); } );\n  },\n\n  _renderExampleComponent: function() {\n    var componentName =\n      this._convertToTitle(this.props.exampleName).replace(\' \', \'\') + \'Example\';\n    // Component must be defined in the global namespace\n    var componentFunction = window[componentName];\n    if (!componentFunction) {\n      throw new Error(\'_renderExampleComponent did not recognise this.props.exampleName\');\n    }\n\n    return React.createElement(componentFunction);\n  },\n\n  _renderExampleCode: function() {\n    var scriptId = this.props.exampleName + \'-example-script\';\n    var exampleCodeContent = document.getElementById(scriptId).innerHTML;\n    return (\n      React.createElement("pre", {className: "react-example__code"}, \nexampleCodeContent\n      )\n    );\n  },\n\n  propTypes: {\n    headerType: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    text: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    id: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n  },\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      React.createElement("div", {className: "react-example"}, \n        React.createElement(BookmarkableHeader, {\n          headerType: "h3", \n          text: this._convertToTitle(this.props.exampleName), \n          id: this.props.exampleName}\n        ), \n        this._renderExampleComponent(), \n        React.createElement("pre", null, \n          this._renderExampleCode()\n        )\n      )\n    );\n  }\n});\n\nvar MultipleExamplesAndCode = React.createClass({displayName: "MultipleExamplesAndCode",\n  render: function() {\n    var examples = this.props.exampleNames.map(function(exampleName) {\n      return (React.createElement(ExampleDemoAndCode, {exampleName: exampleName, key: exampleName}));\n    });\n    return (\n      React.createElement("div", {className: "code-examples"}, \n        examples\n      )\n    );\n  }\n});\n\nReact.render(React.createElement(MultipleExamplesAndCode, {exampleNames: [\'basic\',\n  \'infinite-scroll\']}), document.getElementById(\'react-waypoint-examples\'));\n  \n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,\n  </script>\n </head>\n <body>\n  <header class="header">\n   <h1>\n    React Waypoint\n   </h1>\n  </header>\n  <main class="main-content">\n   <a href="https://github.com/brigade/react-waypoint">\n    <img alt="Fork me on GitHub" data-canonical-src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/github/ribbons/forkme_right_orange_ff7600.png" src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/652c5b9acfaddf3a9c326fa6bde407b87f7be0f4/68747470733a2f2f73332e616d617a6f6e6177732e636f6d2f6769746875622f726962626f6e732f666f726b6d655f72696768745f6f72616e67655f6666373630302e706e67" style="position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; border: 0;"/>\n   </a>\n   <p>\n    A React component to execute a function whenever you scroll to an element.\n  React Waypoint can be used to build features like lazy loading content,\n  infinite scroll, or docking elements to the viewport on scroll.\n   </p>\n   <p>\n    Inspired by\n    <a href="https://github.com/imakewebthings/waypoints">\n     Waypoints\n    </a>\n    ,\n  except this little library grooves the\n    <a href="https://github.com/facebook/react">\n     React way\n    </a>\n    .\n   </p>\n   <h2>\n    Examples\n   </h2>\n   <div id="react-waypoint-examples">\n    <div class="code-examples" data-reactid=".0">\n     <div class="react-example" data-reactid=".0.$basic">\n      <h3 class="bookmarkable-header" data-reactid=".0.$basic.0">\n       <a aria-hidden="true" class="bookmarkable-header__symbol" data-reactid=".0.$basic.0.0" href="#basic">\n        \xc2\xa7\n       </a>\n       <span class="bookmarkable-header__text" data-reactid=".0.$basic.0.1" id="basic">\n        Basic\n       </span>\n      </h3>\n      <div class="basic-example" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1">\n       <div class="basic-example__scrollable-parent" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1">\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.0">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.1">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.2">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.3">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.4">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__waypoint-line" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.5">\n        </div>\n        <span data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.6" style="font-size:0;">\n        </span>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.7">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.8">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.9">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.a">\n        </div>\n        <div class="basic-example__spacer" data-reactid=".0.$basic.1.1.b">\n        </div>\n       </div>\n      </div>\n      <pre data-reactid=".0.$basic.2"><pre class="react-example__code" data-reactid=".0.$basic.2.0">var PropTypes = React.PropTypes;\n\nvar BasicExample = React.createClass({\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  getInitialState: function() {\n    return {};\n  },\n\n  _setMessage: function(msg) {\n    this.setState({ message: msg });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderMessage: function() {\n    if (!this.state.message) {\n      return;\n    }\n\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="basic-example__message"&gt;\n          {this.state.message}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="basic-example"&gt;\n        {this._renderMessage()}\n        &lt;div className="basic-example__scrollable-parent"&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__waypoint-line"/&gt;\n          &lt;Waypoint\n            onEnter={this._setMessage.bind(this, \'Waypoint entered\')}\n            onLeave={this._setMessage.bind(this, \'Waypoint left\')}\n          /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  }\n});\n  </pre></pre>\n     </div>\n     <div class="react-example" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll">\n      <h3 class="bookmarkable-header" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.0">\n       <a aria-hidden="true" class="bookmarkable-header__symbol" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.0.0" href="#infinite-scroll">\n        \xc2\xa7\n       </a>\n       <span class="bookmarkable-header__text" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.0.1" id="infinite-scroll">\n        Infinite Scroll\n       </span>\n      </h3>\n      <div class="infinite-scroll-example" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1">\n       <p class="infinite-scroll-example__count" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.0">\n        <span data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.0.0">\n         Items Loaded:\n        </span>\n        <span data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.0.1">\n         6\n        </span>\n       </p>\n       <div class="infinite-scroll-example__scrollable-parent" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1">\n        <img alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... " class="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.0:$0" src="http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-9.jpg" style="height:480px;"/>\n        <img alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... " class="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.0:$1" src="http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-10.jpg" style="height:480px;"/>\n        <img alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... " class="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.0:$2" src="http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-10.jpg" style="height:480px;"/>\n        <img alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... " class="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.0:$3" src="http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-1.jpg" style="height:480px;"/>\n        <img alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... " class="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.0:$4" src="http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-2.jpg" style="height:480px;"/>\n        <img alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... " class="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.0:$5" src="http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-3.jpg" style="height:480px;"/>\n        <div class="infinite-scroll-example__waypoint" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.1">\n         <span data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.1.0" style="font-size:0;">\n         </span>\n         <span data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.1.1.1">\n          Loading more items\xe2\x80\xa6\n         </span>\n        </div>\n       </div>\n       <p class="infinite-scroll-example__arrow" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.1.2">\n       </p>\n      </div>\n      <pre data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.2"><pre class="react-example__code" data-reactid=".0.$infinite-scroll.2.0">/**\n * Randomly return either a cat or machine image url\n * @return {string}\n */\nvar currentIndex = 0;\nvar generateItem = function() {\n  var chooseCat = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2);\n  var ind = (currentIndex % 10) + 1;\n  var newImage = (chooseCat) ?\n    \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-\' + ind + \'.jpg\':\n    \'http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-\' + ind + \'.jpg\';\n  currentIndex++;\n  return newImage;\n}\n\nvar InfiniteScrollExample = React.createClass({\n  _loadMoreItems: function() {\n    var itemsToAdd = 3;\n    var secondsToWait = 2;\n    this.setState({ isLoading: true });\n    // fake an async. ajax call with setTimeout\n    window.setTimeout(function() {\n      // add data\n      var currentItems = this.state.items;\n      for (var i = 0; i &lt; itemsToAdd; i++) {\n        currentItems.push(generateItem());\n      }\n      this.setState({\n        items: currentItems,\n        isLoading: false,\n      });\n    }.bind(this), secondsToWait * 1000);\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  getInitialState: function() {\n    var initialItems = [\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-9.jpg\',\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-10.jpg\',\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-10.jpg\',\n    ];\n    return {\n      items: initialItems,\n      isLoading: false,\n    };\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderItems: function() {\n    return this.state.items.map(function(imageUrl, index) {\n      return (\n        &lt;img\n          src={imageUrl}\n          alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... "\n          style={{ height: 480 }}\n          key={index}\n          className="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" /&gt;\n      );\n    });\n  },\n\n\n  _renderWaypoint: function() {\n    if (!this.state.isLoading) {\n      return (\n        &lt;Waypoint\n          onEnter={this._loadMoreItems}\n        /&gt;\n      );\n    }\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="infinite-scroll-example"&gt;\n        &lt;p className="infinite-scroll-example__count"&gt;\n          Items Loaded: {this.state.items.length}\n        &lt;/p&gt;\n        &lt;div className="infinite-scroll-example__scrollable-parent"&gt;\n          {this._renderItems()}\n          &lt;div className="infinite-scroll-example__waypoint"&gt;\n            {this._renderWaypoint()}\n            Loading more items\xe2\x80\xa6\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;p className="infinite-scroll-example__arrow" /&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  }\n});\n  </pre></pre>\n     </div>\n    </div>\n   </div>\n   <h2>\n    Documentation\n   </h2>\n   <h3>\n    Installation\n   </h3>\n   <pre>npm install react-waypoint --save</pre>\n   <h3>\n    Usage\n   </h3>\n   <pre>var Waypoint = require(\'react-waypoint\');</pre>\n   <pre>&lt;Waypoint\n  onEnter={this._handleWaypointEnter}\n  onLeave={this._handleWaypointLeave}\n/&gt;</pre>\n   <h3>\n    Prop types\n   </h3>\n   <pre>propTypes: {\n    onEnter: PropTypes.func, // function called when waypoint enters viewport\n    onLeave: PropTypes.func, // function called when waypoint leaves viewport\n  },</pre>\n   <h3>\n    Credits\n   </h3>\n   <p>\n    Credit to\n    <a href="https://github.com/trotzig">\n     trotzig\n    </a>\n    and\n    <a href="https://github.com/lencioni">\n     lencioni\n    </a>\n    for writing\n                this component, and the\n    <a href="https://github.com/brigade/">\n     Brigade\n                  team\n    </a>\n    for open sourcing it.\n   </p>\n   <p>\n    Thanks to the creator of the original Waypoints library,\n    <a href="https://github.com/imakewebthings">\n     imakewebthings\n    </a>\n    .\n   </p>\n   <h3>\n    License\n   </h3>\n   <p>\n    <a href="https://github.com/brigade/react-waypoint/blob/master/LICENSE">\n     MIT\n    </a>\n   </p>\n  </main>\n  <script id="basic-example-script" type="text/jsx">\n   var PropTypes = React.PropTypes;\n\nvar BasicExample = React.createClass({\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  getInitialState: function() {\n    return {};\n  },\n\n  _setMessage: function(msg) {\n    this.setState({ message: msg });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderMessage: function() {\n    if (!this.state.message) {\n      return;\n    }\n\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="basic-example__message"&gt;\n          {this.state.message}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="basic-example"&gt;\n        {this._renderMessage()}\n        &lt;div className="basic-example__scrollable-parent"&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__waypoint-line"/&gt;\n          &lt;Waypoint\n            onEnter={this._setMessage.bind(this, \'Waypoint entered\')}\n            onLeave={this._setMessage.bind(this, \'Waypoint left\')}\n          /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n          &lt;div className="basic-example__spacer" /&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  }\n});\n  </script>\n  <script id="infinite-scroll-example-script" type="text/jsx">\n   /**\n * Randomly return either a cat or machine image url\n * @return {string}\n */\nvar currentIndex = 0;\nvar generateItem = function() {\n  var chooseCat = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2);\n  var ind = (currentIndex % 10) + 1;\n  var newImage = (chooseCat) ?\n    \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-\' + ind + \'.jpg\':\n    \'http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-\' + ind + \'.jpg\';\n  currentIndex++;\n  return newImage;\n}\n\nvar InfiniteScrollExample = React.createClass({\n  _loadMoreItems: function() {\n    var itemsToAdd = 3;\n    var secondsToWait = 2;\n    this.setState({ isLoading: true });\n    // fake an async. ajax call with setTimeout\n    window.setTimeout(function() {\n      // add data\n      var currentItems = this.state.items;\n      for (var i = 0; i &lt; itemsToAdd; i++) {\n        currentItems.push(generateItem());\n      }\n      this.setState({\n        items: currentItems,\n        isLoading: false,\n      });\n    }.bind(this), secondsToWait * 1000);\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  getInitialState: function() {\n    var initialItems = [\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-9.jpg\',\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/cats-q-c-640-480-10.jpg\',\n      \'http://lorempixel.com/output/technics-q-c-640-480-10.jpg\',\n    ];\n    return {\n      items: initialItems,\n      isLoading: false,\n    };\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderItems: function() {\n    return this.state.items.map(function(imageUrl, index) {\n      return (\n        &lt;img\n          src={imageUrl}\n          alt="CATS AND ROBOTS... "\n          style={{ height: 480 }}\n          key={index}\n          className="infinite-scroll-example__list-item" /&gt;\n      );\n    });\n  },\n\n\n  _renderWaypoint: function() {\n    if (!this.state.isLoading) {\n      return (\n        &lt;Waypoint\n          onEnter={this._loadMoreItems}\n        /&gt;\n      );\n    }\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="infinite-scroll-example"&gt;\n        &lt;p className="infinite-scroll-example__count"&gt;\n          Items Loaded: {this.state.items.length}\n        &lt;/p&gt;\n        &lt;div className="infinite-scroll-example__scrollable-parent"&gt;\n          {this._renderItems()}\n          &lt;div className="infinite-scroll-example__waypoint"&gt;\n            {this._renderWaypoint()}\n            Loading more items\xe2\x80\xa6\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;p className="infinite-scroll-example__arrow" /&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  }\n});\n  </script>\n  <script type="text/jsx">\n   var PropTypes = React.PropTypes;\n\nvar BookmarkableHeader = React.createClass({\n  propTypes: {\n    headerType: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    text: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    id: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderLink: function() {\n    return (\n      &lt;a\n        aria-hidden\n        href={\'#\' + this.props.id} className="bookmarkable-header__symbol"\n      &gt;\n        \xc2\xa7\n      &lt;/a&gt;\n    );\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  _renderText: function() {\n    return (\n      &lt;span id={this.props.id} className="bookmarkable-header__text"&gt;\n        {this.props.text}\n      &lt;/span&gt;\n    );\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * @return {Object}\n   */\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      React.createElement(\n        this.props.headerType,\n        { className: \'bookmarkable-header\' },\n        (this._renderLink()),\n        (this._renderText())\n      )\n    );\n  }\n});\n\nvar ExampleDemoAndCode = React.createClass({\n  /**\n   * @param {String} words\n   * @return {String}\n   */\n  _convertToTitle: function(words) {\n    return words.replace(/-|_/g, \' \')\n    .replace(/\\b\\s?(\\S)/g, function(match, group) { return match.toUpperCase(); } );\n  },\n\n  _renderExampleComponent: function() {\n    var componentName =\n      this._convertToTitle(this.props.exampleName).replace(\' \', \'\') + \'Example\';\n    // Component must be defined in the global namespace\n    var componentFunction = window[componentName];\n    if (!componentFunction) {\n      throw new Error(\'_renderExampleComponent did not recognise this.props.exampleName\');\n    }\n\n    return React.createElement(componentFunction);\n  },\n\n  _renderExampleCode: function() {\n    var scriptId = this.props.exampleName + \'-example-script\';\n    var exampleCodeContent = document.getElementById(scriptId).innerHTML;\n    return (\n      &lt;pre className="react-example__code"&gt;\n{exampleCodeContent}\n      &lt;/pre&gt;\n    );\n  },\n\n  propTypes: {\n    headerType: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    text: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n    id: PropTypes.string.isRequired,\n  },\n  render: function() {\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="react-example"&gt;\n        &lt;BookmarkableHeader\n          headerType="h3"\n          text={this._convertToTitle(this.props.exampleName)}\n          id={this.props.exampleName}\n        /&gt;\n        {this._renderExampleComponent()}\n        &lt;pre&gt;\n          {this._renderExampleCode()}\n        &lt;/pre&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  }\n});\n\nvar MultipleExamplesAndCode = React.createClass({\n  render: function() {\n    var examples = this.props.exampleNames.map(function(exampleName) {\n      return (&lt;ExampleDemoAndCode exampleName={exampleName} key={exampleName} /&gt;);\n    });\n    return (\n      &lt;div className="code-examples"&gt;\n        {examples}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  }\n});\n\nReact.render(&lt;MultipleExamplesAndCode exampleNames={[\'basic\',\n  \'infinite-scroll\']} /&gt;, document.getElementById(\'react-waypoint-examples\'));\n  </script>\n </body>\n</html>'
